item.title: CALEA II: Risks of Wiretap Modifications to Endpoints
item.description: Authors: Adida, Ben and Anderson, Collin and Anton, Annie I. and Blaze, Matt and Dingledine, Roger and Felten, Edward W. and Green, Matthew D. and Halderman, J. Alex and Jefferson, David R. and Jennings, Cullen and Landau, Susan and Mitter, Navroop and Neumann, Peter G. and Rescorla, Eric and Schneider, Fred B. and Schneier, Bruce and Shacham, Hovav and Sherr, Micah and Wagner, David and Zimmermann, Philip Published: May 2013
